name: instNoZeroDivisorsOrderDual
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : Mul α
inst✝ : Zero α
h : NoZeroDivisors α
⊢ NoZeroDivisors (OrderDual α)
decl: instance [Mul α] [Zero α] [h : NoZeroDivisors α] : NoZeroDivisors αᵒᵈ := h

name: instNoZeroDivisorsLex
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : Mul α
inst✝ : Zero α
h : NoZeroDivisors α
⊢ NoZeroDivisors (Lex α)
decl: instance [Mul α] [Zero α] [h : NoZeroDivisors α] : NoZeroDivisors (Lex α) := h
